messages.title: Let's get Britain on the road to recovery
messages.content: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again.

issues.economy: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again.

leaflet.personalStatement: As Chancellor of the Exchequer I would implement policies that are kind to small businesses and fair to your household. We will break up the banks to ensure that people's savings are safe. And we'll cut income tax for low earners to put money back in the pockets of ordinary families.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Enclosed form to apply for a postal vote. Encourages to vote Liberal Democrats for change and recovery.
